words.definition: to help someone understand something better
words.sentence: The teacher drew a diagram on the board to _____ the math problem for us.

words.definition: written directions or explanation of how to complete a task
words.sentence: The instruction manual for building the model airplane is a type of _____.

words.definition: a list of events in the order they occur
words.sentence: We placed the timeline cards in _____ order from the oldest event to the newest.
The heavy storm was the _____ of the power outage.

words.definition: the result or outcome of something happening
words.sentence: Getting a good grade was the _____ of studying hard all week.
The museum displays many _____ artifacts from the Civil War.

words.definition: the title of a passage of text which says what the topic will be
words.sentence: I read the _____ at the top of the page to predict what the article was about.

words.definition: a word or words in darker type than the surrounding text, used to help signal the word is important
words.sentence: The author put the vocabulary word in _____ to make it stand out.

words.definition: a sentence or phrase written under a picture to explain what the picture is
words.sentence: Under the photo of the eagle, the _____ explained where the bird lives.

words.definition: a chart where facts or numbers are organized to make them easy to read
words.sentence: We looked at the _____ to compare the population numbers of different cities.
